class.name: Adventurer
class.desc: This class is the basic class, it hasn't any special attributes

specie.name: Human
specie.desc: This specie is the basic specie, it hasn't any special attributes

object.name: Stick
object.desc: A stick you found is the forest, it is rather useless.

en.init_alert: *Uh oh!* RP is not ready? Let me fix that!
en.init_success: *Haha!* RP is ready, but there's isn't much variety! Add classes/species/items using `l!rp admin specie/class/item create`! You would want to edit the more advanced settings usin `l!rp admin settings`
en.char_init: Hello wanderer! Welcome in our wonderful world! May I know your name?
en.error_no_class: *Uh oh!* There aren't any classes? I can't do that without any! Create one using `l!rp admin class create`! You might continue to initalise your character using `l!rp char class`
en.error_no_specie: *Uh oh!* There aren't any species? I can't do that without any! Create one using `l!rp admin specie create`! You might continue to initalise your character using `l!rp char specie`
en.error_char_ask_class_syntax: *Huh?* I didn't quite get your class name!
en.error_char_ask_specie_syntax: *Huh?* I didn't quite get your specie name!
